user_query: In the YouTube 360 VR video from March 2018 narrated by the voice actor of Lord of the Rings' Gollum, what number was mentioned by the narrator directly after dinosaurs were first shown in the video?

1.panel_description: Identify the voice actor who played Gollum in the Lord of the Rings series.

1.handles: Identifying the voice actor of Gollum in the Lord of the Rings series.

input_vars.name: query_voice_actor
input_vars.description: Query to find the voice actor of Gollum in the Lord of the Rings series.
input_vars.value: Who is the voice actor of Gollum in the Lord of the Rings series?

output_vars.name: voice_actor_name
output_vars.description: Name of the voice actor who played Gollum.

2.panel_description: Locate the YouTube 360 VR video from March 2018 narrated by the identified voice actor.

1.handles: Locating the YouTube 360 VR video from March 2018 narrated by the identified voice actor.

input_vars.name: query_video
input_vars.description: Query to find the YouTube 360 VR video from March 2018 narrated by the identified voice actor.
input_vars.value: YouTube 360 VR video from March 2018 narrated by [voice_actor_name]

output_vars.name: video_url
output_vars.description: URL of the located YouTube 360 VR video.

3.panel_description: Verify the video and find the point where dinosaurs first appear.

1.handles: Verifying the video and finding the point where dinosaurs first appear.

input_vars.name: query_dinosaurs
input_vars.description: Query to verify the video and find the point where dinosaurs first appear.
input_vars.value: Verify the video at [video_url] and find the point where dinosaurs first appear

output_vars.name: dinosaurs_appearance_time
output_vars.description: Time in the video where dinosaurs first appear.

4.panel_description: Determine the number mentioned by the narrator immediately after the dinosaurs appear.

1.handles: Determining the number mentioned by the narrator immediately after the dinosaurs appear.

input_vars.name: query_number
input_vars.description: Query to determine the number mentioned by the narrator immediately after the dinosaurs appear.
input_vars.value: In the video at [video_url], what number is mentioned by the narrator immediately after the dinosaurs appear at [dinosaurs_appearance_time]?

output_vars.name: mentioned_number
output_vars.description: Number mentioned by the narrator immediately after the dinosaurs appear.
